name: Sticky Notes for Design Critiques
description:
Use these digital sticky notes to classify your feedback during or after remote design critiques.


Duplicate the file, add your teams' avatars as components, and publish it as a library to access them from the Assets panel.


Available categories:

  • Question
  • To Do
  • Idea
  • Positive Feedback
  • Negative Feedback


Got feedback? Let me know!
